headline: Mizuho Reiterates Its Neutral Rating and $133.00 Price Target on EOG Resources, Inc. (EOG)
summary: EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) is one of the 13 Safest Stocks to Invest in Now, supported by hedge fund interest and significant return on equity. Mizuho reiterated its neutral rating and $133.00 price target on EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) on October 1 in advance of the company’s Q3 2025 results announcement on November 6. While […]

headline: ExxonMobil's Upstream Focus and Financial Strength Drive Resilience
summary: XOM's low-cost, high-return assets and strong balance sheet underpin its resilience across volatile commodity cycles.

headline: EOG Resources (EOG): Exploring the Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: EOG Resources (EOG) has seen its shares trade flat today, encouraging investors to take a closer look at recent stock performance and key fundamentals. The energy company’s shares have slipped about 6% over the past month. See our latest analysis for EOG Resources. EOG Resources’ share price has trended lower in 2024, declining 6% in the past month and over 11% year-to-date as energy stocks have lost some momentum. Despite this softer stretch, EOG’s five-year total shareholder return is a...
